Title: Prohibits the advertisement of firearms as combat weapons
Summary: Prohibits the advertisement of firearms as combat weapons; exempts the advertisement of such rifles, shotguns, or firearms for the purposes of recreation, hunting, self-defense or other legal uses of such firearms.
LawCode: Add ยง396-eee, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to prohibiting the advertisement of firearms as combat weapons
